trends: There has been one other sighting in Barneveld
There was one other sighting in Barneveld on or around December 1st 2012
divs: sighting detailsfiery orb was in the nw sky. i was walking my dogs. it was a cloudy night with no visible stars. i was on the east side of my house when i looked north. i saw a yellow\orange light. at first i assumed it was a planet except that it was larger than any i'd ever seen and it was a pulsating fire like ball. i watched for a few seconds from the driveway on the north side of my house and then i ran in to get my wife. when i came out i think i saw it through the trees but much lower and possibly descending. by the time i got back to the driveway it was gone. i notified the local tv station and asked if anyone else saw it. they said no. i took note of the time shortly after the event and it was 5:40 pm est. 25 years ago i saw a fiery green thing fall out of the sky in the same direction. after i reported it a man in military clothing came and had me triangulate the sighting because others in the area also witnessed it. many weeks later a small article said the air force had found a meteorite. this thing that i saw yesterday was not moving.
